title: Electrical Tools Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of tools and supplies used in electrical work around the home.

questions.question: Which tool is used to test whether an electrical circuit is live or has voltage present?
What is a wire stripper used for?
options: Removing the insulation coating from electrical wire without damaging the conductor

questions.question: Which device in an electrical panel automatically shuts off power when a circuit is overloaded?
What is electrical tape primarily used for?
Which tool is used to measure voltage, current, and resistance in electrical circuits?
What are wire nuts (twist-on connectors) used for?
options: Securely joining two or more electrical wires together

questions.question: Which type of pliers has a long, tapered nose for reaching into tight spaces and bending wire?
What is a fish tape used for in electrical work?
options: Pulling wire through conduit and walls

questions.question: Which safety device is required in bathrooms and kitchens, and trips when it detects a ground fault?
What does the color green or bare copper indicate on an electrical wire?
Which tool uses heat to melt a metal alloy to join electrical components or wires?
What is conduit used for in electrical installations?
Which heavy-duty pliers with a built-in cutting edge are the go-to tool for professional electricians?
What is a junction box used for?
options: Enclosing wire connections to protect them and meet building codes

questions.question: Which device protects electronics by diverting excess voltage from power surges?
options: Surge protector (power strip with surge protection)
